page.title: 11FARMING/INDUSTRY
page.content: cows are now chained up. We have to collect our annual supply of wood from Euden Saw Mill. We check the sheep which are going to Holmfirth Market. We help other farmers such as John Key with his potatoes, starting muck spreading and fertilizing the grond again. Winter By now the sheep are probablybrought in again and kept in. Mucking out daily begins as well as rearing calves from the market. {BRITISH STEEL} British Steel own a lot of things,and there's three of them in our "D" block. The first is Underbank Hall. Underbank Hall is not a listed building. We are not certain when it was built because the records were lost. two people were killed near the
